definition: to love dearly/to feel sorry for sb/to regret/to grudge/to be distressed
to favor a junior/to show favoritism to some juniors
to forget past pains once the wound has healed (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 le5 shang1 ba1 wang4 le5 teng2

definition: it's all very well to talk, but getting things done is another matter (idiom)/to be an armchair expert/to blabber on
pinyin: zhan4 zhe5 shuo1 hua4 bu4 yao1 teng2

sentences.english: Is there pain with your perspiration?
sentences.chinese: 当你流汗的时候觉得疼吗？

sentences.english: A：Yes, I have a terrible stomachache.
The smoke is stinging my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 烟把我的眼睛熏得很疼。

sentences.english: My scar was still very tender.
sentences.chinese: 我的伤疤仍然是一碰就疼。

sentences.english: My elbow banged against the door last week and it still hurt.
sentences.chinese: 我的胳膊肘在一个礼拜前撞在了门上，到现在还很疼。

sentences.english: He winced as she stood on his injured foot .
sentences.chinese: 她踩着他受伤的脚，他疼得龇牙咧嘴。

sentences.english: These younger generations really are abunch… The world is doomed.
sentences.chinese: 这些年轻人真是闲的蛋疼，这个世界要完了。

sentences.english: The pain was o intolerable that I wished I were dead.
sentences.chinese: 这种疼痛实在难受，疼的我真想死。

sentences.english: His new shoes chafed his feet.
When winter came, the grasshopper had nothing, but the ant complained of chest pains.
sentences.chinese: 到了冬天，蚱蜢一无所有，可是蚂蚁却喊胸口疼。

sentences.english: My heart thumps fast. My wrist is hurting. Wes is killing me.
sentences.chinese: 我心跳加快，手腕很疼，维斯简直是在要我的命啊。

sentences.english: Hook finger hurts you for my whole life, put on wedding you is my bride.
sentences.chinese: 勾勾手指疼你一生一世，穿上婚纱你就是我的新娘。

sentences.english: He was found on the morning of the first day in his room downstairs helpless with pain.
sentences.chinese: 发病那天上午人家在楼下他的房间里发现他疼得利害。

sentences.english: My muscle were wore after the 100-meter dash.
sentences.chinese: 跑完100米后我的肌肉很疼。

definition: to sneak in/to infiltrate/to be piercingly painful/to be unbearable (of pain, itch etc)
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
to love dearly/to feel sorry for sb/to regret/to grudge/to be distressed
variant of 癢|痒[yang3]/to itch/to tickle
to throb with pain/throbbing pain/twang/pang/CL:陣|阵[zhen4]
to ache/to be sore/to feel painful
